CustomField.description: This field excludes the opportunity from process automation. It's used when we import new opportunity and its renewal date is too close. It should be reviewed by the Sales Manager before we start sending automated emails to customers.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Excludes the opportunity from the renewal process automation. It was likely imported too close to the Renewal Date. Review the opportunity, adjust the stage appropriately, and then uncheck this field.
CustomField.label: Draft
